description:
Crossroad Simulator — a fun junction simulator. Operate traffic lights to control the flow of city traffic and help pedestrians cross intersections. Be careful, otherwise everything will turn into chaos!

Complete various tasks — from the simplest with two roads and cars, to the most difficult with a large number of roads and special transport.

Game Features:
- Realistic physics and sophisticated forklift control system
- Interesting tasks of varying difficulty
- A variety of vehicles — from cars to special transport
- Many variations of intersections and traffic lights
name: Crossroad Simulator
